creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
inscription: LRQ: [The Man of Tao Chikuseki  {The Bamboo & Rock Man of Tao} has painted only a rock / He has not added a single bamboo to complement this cloud-shaped marvel. / Monumental, frank and honest, proud between Heaven and earth, / This is a portrait of the Man of Tao himself as he appears once he is drunk] (AS)
title: Rock
